CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.Name = "Enterprise" && Internal_User_Amount__c >0 && Internal_User_Amount__c <25, 0.08, IF( RecordType.Name = "Enterprise" && Internal_User_Amount__c >24 && Internal_User_Amount__c <31, 0.12, IF( RecordType.Name = "Enterprise" && Internal_User_Amount__c >30, 0.14,
IF( RecordType.Name = "Agency" || RecordType.Name = "Marketer" && Internal_User_Amount__c >0 && Internal_User_Amount__c <45, 0.08, IF( RecordType.Name = "Agency" || RecordType.Name = "Marketer" && Internal_User_Amount__c > 45 && Internal_User_Amount__c <56, 0.12, IF( RecordType.Name = "Agency" || RecordType.Name = "Marketer" && Internal_User_Amount__c >55, 0.14,
IF( RecordType.Name = "Upsell" || RecordType.Name = "Upsell Agency" || RecordType.Name = "Upsell Enterprise" || RecordType.Name = "Upsell Marketer" || RecordType.Name = "Expansion" , 0.10,
0)))))))
CustomField.label: Commission Tier
